form.name: form1

div.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small

span.div: I want to inform the Montezuma community that I have accepted a Superintendent position that is shared with the Maquoketa Valley and North Linn School Districts. I officially resigned from my position at Montezuma on April 8th.

div.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small
color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small

span.div: Jane and I are very grateful to everyone at Montezuma. We have enjoyed our time here more than we could have even hoped. Thank you for welcoming and working with us during our stay.

div.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small
color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small

span.div: Both North Linn and Maquoketa Valley are very good districts with strong academics and the Maquoketa Valley District is located about 15 minutes from Dyersville, which is where I grew up. There is just something about home that draws many people back, and that includes Jane and I. We both have numerous family members in the Dyersville area. Being in a good district and being close to home made this an appealing position for me.

div.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small
color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small

span.div: I can only hope that my next position will go as well as my position in Montezuma. The Montezuma District and all of the staff are as good as I can ever hope to be associated with. I will be working through June with all of the staff as we complete this challenging school year and to prepare for the school year in the fall.

div.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small
color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small

span.div: Jane and I want to thank the entire Montezuma community.

div.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small
color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small
color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small

span.div: Please take time to fill out the survey. Your feedback is going to be very important as we move forward in the search for our new Superintendent. click on the link below to complete the survey. Thank you
Click on the link below for the latest update on the Superintendent.

source.p: To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video
